data.title: Electronics and Nanoscale Engineering
data.text:
Head of Division: Professor Hadi Heidari

We are 45 academics working on Electronics, Photonics, and Quantum & Nano technologies. The research in our division addresses a broad range of socially and industrially important applications in our many partnerships in academia, industry and government bodies.

Key areas of interest for in our division include: sensors; telecommunications; quantum technologies; terahertz and millimetre wave technology; advanced microelectronic devices; device simulation; metrology; and instrumentation.

Join the ENE Division

PhD & Job oportunities:

We are actively looking to recruit new people for our diverse and inovative research themes. Please contact specific groups for more information and ongoing position in your area of interest.
